identified-content.classifier: Top/Classifieds/Job Market/Job Categories/Fashion, Beauty and Fitness

abstract.p: Photos of plaid shoes, boots and hosiery (Plaid Pulse column) (S)

block.p: Plaid isn't just for trench coat linings anymore. After last year's craze for Burberry plaid, the fashion world is finding ways to tweak the tartan. This season, using whimsical materials like leather and fur, and processes like tie-dyeing and silk-screening, designers are exploding the pattern of decorum. Even Burberry breaks out of the traditional grid -- as witnessed by its new monochrome jacquard plaid ties and bold plaid high-heel boots. To be sure, too much of a good thing can cause ganglion overload: Don't try these combos outside your home.
Urban Outfitters' Lycra tights ($12), wool loafers by Kate Spade ($235) and a vampish pair of Burberry boots ($395) take the store's once-stodgy image from Queen Mum to King's Road in one quick zip.
